main event: A duck hunter observed a silvery spherical object near Farmington, Utah, on October 23, 1962.
interesting points: The object was approximately 15 feet in diameter and appeared gray and silver., It approached at a speed of about 700 knots and was visible for around 20 seconds., The object emitted a sound similar to rushing air or duck wings., After passing overhead, the object swerved southeast and disappeared at a tremendous speed., The observer believed the sighting did not correspond to any normal type of aircraft.
sighted object: one gray and silver spherical object
witness description: A driver from Salt Lake Transportation Company, described as a logical and stable person.
